name: Plej
description: For years we have done everything we can to say about ourselves: BRAND EXPERIENCE AGENCY. And while we are constantly evolving and changing, this motto has always been our focus. We are an agency that offers a full range of integrated marketing services. We do not share digital, ATL, BTL and event thinking. We focus on a holistic and broad approach to briefings and campaigns. And above all for emotions and real experiences.
